org.blockchain_innovation.factom.client.api.ops

Enum Encoding

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Encoding>
      • org.blockchain_innovation.factom.client.api.ops.Encoding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Encoding>

    public enum Encoding
extends java.lang.Enum<Encoding>
    Create a common entry point for all ancoding and decoding operations needed. Supports hex, base58, base64, utf-8 by selecting the correct enum value.
